articles.description: Australia's campaign for a third consecutive T20 World Cup title has kicked off with a comprehensive practice match win over fellow title contenders India
articles.content:
Australia have started their T20 World Cup campaign on a positive note, sealing a 43-run victory over India in a low-scoring warm-up clash at Newlands Cricket Ground.

articles.title: Jesse Marsch sacked by Leeds United after poor run of results - ESPN India
articles.description: Jesse Marsch has been sacked as Leeds United manager after less than a year in charge at the Premier League club.
articles.content:
Jesse Marsch has been sacked as Leeds United manager after a poor run of results, the club announced Monday.
